title: Louisiana Brides
description: Louisiana Brides: Bayou Fever/Bayou Beginnings/Bayou Secrets Historical Romance: A love of the Louisiana bayou makes three women yearn for love and family in their own Cajun country, but circumstances and relationships seem to pull them away. Clothilde's plans to go to school in New Orleans might change after young Theo steals her heart. Angeline's beau dreams of becoming a medical researcher, taking him away from her to the big city. Gen's bayou secret-a newborn daughter-force her to put aside her dreams of true love. Will these women allow God to guide their lives, or will the plans of men thwart their happiness forever?
author: Kathleen Y'Barbo
